00050 typedef struct MovieReconstructedCamera {
00051     int framenr;
00052     float error;
00053     float mat[4][4];
00054 } MovieReconstructedCamera;
00055 
00056 typedef struct MovieTrackingCamera {
00057     void *intrinsics;   /* intrinsics handle */
00058 
00059     float sensor_width; /* width of CCD sensor */
00060     float pixel_aspect; /* pixel aspect ratio */
00061     float pad;
00062     float focal;        /* focal length */
00063     short units;        /* units of focal length user is working with */
00064     short pad1;
00065     float principal[2]; /* principal point */
00066     float k1, k2, k3;   /* radial distortion */
00067 } MovieTrackingCamera;
00068 
00069 typedef struct MovieTrackingMarker {
00070     float pos[2];   /* 2d position of marker on frame (in unified 0..1 space) */
00071     int framenr;    /* number of frame marker is associated with */
00072     int flag;       /* Marker's flag (alive, ...) */
00073 } MovieTrackingMarker;
00074 
00075 typedef struct MovieTrackingTrack {
00076     struct MovieTrackingTrack *next, *prev;
00077 
00078     char name[64];  /* MAX_NAME */
00079 
00080     /* ** setings ** */
00081     float pat_min[2], pat_max[2];       /* positions of left-bottom and right-top corners of pattern (in unified 0..1 space) */
00082     float search_min[2], search_max[2]; /* positions of left-bottom and right-top corners of search area (in unified 0..1 space) */
00083     float offset[2];                    /* offset to "parenting" point */
00084 
00085     /* ** track ** */
00086     int markersnr;                  /* count of markers in track */
00087     int last_marker;                /* most recently used marker */
00088     MovieTrackingMarker *markers;   /* markers in track */
00089 
00090     /* ** reconstruction data ** */
00091     float bundle_pos[3];            /* reconstructed position */
00092     float error;                    /* average track reprojection error */
00093 
00094     /* ** UI editing ** */
00095     int flag, pat_flag, search_flag;    /* flags (selection, ...) */
00096     float color[3];                     /* custom color for track */
00097 
00098     /* tracking algorithm to use; can be KLT or SAD */
00099     short frames_limit;     /* number of frames to be tarcked during single tracking session (if TRACKING_FRAMES_LIMIT is set) */
00100     short margin;           /* margin from frame boundaries */
00101     short pattern_match;    /* re-adjust every N frames */
00102 
00103     short tracker;          /* tracking algorithm used for this track */
00104 
00105     /* ** KLT tracker settings ** */
00106     short pyramid_levels, pad2;     /* number of pyramid levels to use for KLT tracking */
00107 
00108     /* ** SAD tracker settings ** */
00109     float minimum_correlation;          /* minimal correlation which is still treated as successful tracking */
00110 } MovieTrackingTrack;
00111 
00112 typedef struct MovieTrackingSettings {
00113     int flag;
00114 
00115     /* ** default tracker settings */
00116     short default_tracker;              /* tracking algorithm used by default */
00117     short default_pyramid_levels;       /* number of pyramid levels to use for KLT tracking */
00118     float default_minimum_correlation;  /* minimal correlation which is still treated as successful tracking */
00119     short default_pattern_size;         /* size of pattern area for new tracks */
00120     short default_search_size;          /* size of search area for new tracks */
00121     short default_frames_limit;         /* number of frames to be tarcked during single tracking session (if TRACKING_FRAMES_LIMIT is set) */
00122     short default_margin;               /* margin from frame boundaries */
00123     short default_pattern_match;        /* re-adjust every N frames */
00124     short default_flag;                 /* default flags like color channels used by default */
00125 
00126     short pod;
00127 
00128     /* ** common tracker settings ** */
00129     short speed;            /* speed of tracking */
00130 
00131     /* ** reconstruction settings ** */
00132     int keyframe1, keyframe2;   /* two keyframes for reconstrution initialization */
00133 
00134     /* ** which camera intrinsics to refine. uses on the REFINE_* flags */
00135     short refine_camera_intrinsics, pad23;
00136 
00137     /* ** tool settings ** */
00138 
00139     /* set scale */
00140     float dist;                 /* distance between two bundles used for scene scaling */
00141 
00142     /* cleanup */
00143     int clean_frames, clean_action;
00144     float clean_error;
00145 
00146     /* set object scale */
00147     float object_distance;      /* distance between two bundles used for object scaling */
00148 
00149     int pad3;
00150 } MovieTrackingSettings;
00151 
00152 typedef struct MovieTrackingStabilization {
00153     int flag;
00154     int tot_track, act_track;       /* total number and index of active track in list */
00155 
00156     /* 2d stabilization */
00157     float maxscale;         /* max auto-scale factor */
00158     MovieTrackingTrack *rot_track;  /* track used to stabilize rotation */
00159 
00160     float locinf, scaleinf, rotinf; /* influence on location, scale and rotation */
00161 
00162     int filter;     /* filter used for pixel interpolation */
00163 
00164     /* some pre-computing run-time variables */
00165     int ok;                     /* are precomputed values and scaled buf relevant? */
00166     float scale;                /* autoscale factor */
00167 
00168     struct ImBuf *scaleibuf;    /* currently scaled ibuf */
00169 } MovieTrackingStabilization;
00170 
00171 typedef struct MovieTrackingReconstruction {
00172     int flag;
00173 
00174     float error;        /* average error of reconstruction */
00175 
00176     int last_camera;        /* most recently used camera */
00177     int camnr;              /* number of reconstructed cameras */
00178     struct MovieReconstructedCamera *cameras;   /* reconstructed cameras */
00179 } MovieTrackingReconstruction;
00180 
00181 typedef struct MovieTrackingObject {
00182     struct MovieTrackingObject *next, *prev;
00183 
00184     char name[64];          /* Name of tracking object, MAX_NAME */
00185     int flag;
00186     float scale;            /* scale of object solution in amera space */
00187 
00188     ListBase tracks;        /* list of tracks use to tracking this object */
00189     MovieTrackingReconstruction reconstruction; /* reconstruction data for this object */
00190 } MovieTrackingObject;
00191 
00192 typedef struct MovieTrackingStats {
00193     char message[256];
00194 } MovieTrackingStats;
00195 
00196 typedef struct MovieTracking {
00197     MovieTrackingSettings settings; /* different tracking-related settings */
00198     MovieTrackingCamera camera;     /* camera intrinsics */
00199     ListBase tracks;                /* list of tracks used for camera object */
00200     MovieTrackingReconstruction reconstruction; /* reconstruction data for camera object */
00201     MovieTrackingStabilization stabilization;   /* stabilization data */
00202     MovieTrackingTrack *act_track;      /* active track */
00203 
00204     ListBase objects;
00205     int objectnr, tot_object;       /* index of active object and total number of objects */
00206 
00207     MovieTrackingStats *stats;      /* statistics displaying in clip editor */
00208 } MovieTracking;

00216 /* MovieTrackingMarker->flag */
00217 #define MARKER_DISABLED (1<<0)
00218 #define MARKER_TRACKED  (1<<1)
00219 #define MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_X (1<<2)
00220 #define MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_Y (1<<3)
00221 #define MARKER_GRAPH_SEL    (MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_X|MARKER_GRAPH_SEL_Y)

00224 #define TRACK_HAS_BUNDLE    (1<<1)
00225 #define TRACK_DISABLE_RED   (1<<2)
00226 #define TRACK_DISABLE_GREEN (1<<3)
00227 #define TRACK_DISABLE_BLUE  (1<<4)
00228 #define TRACK_HIDDEN        (1<<5)
00229 #define TRACK_LOCKED        (1<<6)
00230 #define TRACK_CUSTOMCOLOR   (1<<7)
00231 #define TRACK_USE_2D_STAB   (1<<8)
00232 #define TRACK_PREVIEW_GRAYSCALE (1<<9)

00249 #define TRACKING_SPEED_HALF         2
00250 #define TRACKING_SPEED_QUARTER      4

00257 #define REFINE_RADIAL_DISTORTION_K2 (1<<4)

00270 #define TRACKING_RECONSTRUCTED  (1<<0)
